Title: Establishes a waiting period before a firearm, shotgun or rifle may be delivered to a person
Summary: Establishes a ten day waiting period from contact of the National Instant Criminal Background Check System (NICS) before a firearm, shotgun or rifle may be delivered to a person.
LawCode: Amd §400.00, add §400.20, Pen L; amd §§897 & 898, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the general business law, in relation to establishing a waiting period before a firearm, shotgun or rifle may be delivered to a person
